name: The Ordinary Adventures of Vader the Cat
name_original: The Ordinary Adventures of Vader the Cat
description:
You are just a cat who can't let things go. So when a record disappears from a jukebox in your favorite bar you will get to the bottom of it.

Made together with euni.p, who worked on the art, and made for MiniJam 20. 

Theme - music, limitation - OwO

The game is written in PixiJS mixed with my personal mini-engine.
